author: Special Correspondent
text:
HARD TO CRACK:The TANGEDCO has to break the concrete structure on Tiruchi - Dindigul National Highway for setting up electric poles.— Photo: A.Muralitharan

The Corporation has started shifting electric poles on the Tiruchi-Dindigul highway.

The Highways Department set up the medians on this stretch about six months ago for free flow of traffic and avoiding road accidents due to bad overtaking. According to sources, the poles on either side of the highway posed a threat to road users. As the poles could not be shifted immediately, now the Corporation is taking steps to shift these poles in coordination with the Highways Department.

With a view to setting up electrical works including laying of cables, the concrete structure of the median is being broken using concrete cutters for facilitating the setting up of poles. The work would be completed within a week.

Sources of the Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation said that the TANGEDCO would ensure supply to the new poles.
title: Electric poles being shifted
